txt.en: The pungent and unmistakable odour of troll fills your nostrils, and a small shiver of fear creeps up your spine. There must be one or more close by. You should deal with them before they become too great a threat.

The pungent and unmistakable odour of troll fills your nostrils, and a small shiver of fear creeps up your spine. There must be one or more close by. You should deal with them before they become too great a threat.

Trolls are among the more feared weapons of the Enemy. They were bred for war and can devastate a front line, break through barricades or defences, and can bring down structures as well as any ballistae.
The defeat of the trolls will weaken the White Hand forces immensely, and may also hinder the use of their ballistae.
You detect the unmistakable smell of troll coming from somewhere nearby. The trolls from Isengard are walking siege-breakers and are more versatile than the crude ballistae machinery.
The trolls from Isengard would put fear in any Man, and their brute strength would make them a force to be reckoned with on any battlefield.
